3068977.effect: Born into a religious family, Lin Tian-Liao left his hometown and moved to Taipei to study and follow his dreams, trying to escape the pressures of returning to his family's temple in the process. Liao, now able to see the various spirits and gods in the world, has to deal with his new found powers, his school life, and three particular cats who all want to have a say in his life and his future.

6674104.effect:

If you control a Level 10 or higher monster: Tribute any number of "Gesellschaft" monsters with different names from either your hand or field (but not both), and if you do, apply 1 of the following effects.
● 1 Level 10 or higher monster you control gains ATK/DEF equal to the combined original ATK/DEF of the Tributed monsters until the End Phase.
● Destroy 1 monster on the field whose ATK/DEF is less than or equal to the combined original ATK/DEF of the Tributed monsters.
● Destroy up to 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls for every 1500 ATK/DEF the combined original ATK/DEF of the Tributed monsters had.
You can only activate 1 "Hero's Compensation" per turn.
6674104.name: Hero's Compensation

6674104.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Gesellschaft" card.)
Once per turn, while you control a "Gesellschaft "Demon" - Cirque de Malebolge(s)" with more than 0 ATK/DEF, you can negate any card or effect activated by your opponent, then, change the ATK/DEF of 1 Level 10 or higher monster you control to 0. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Special Summon 1 "Gesellschaft" monster from your GY, then, if that monster is Level 10 or higher, you can send 1 "Gesellschaft" card from your Deck to your GY.
● Special Summon 1 "Gesellschaft" monster from your hand, then, if that monster is Level 10 or higher, you can add 1 "Gesellschaft" card from your Deck to your hand, except a Field or Continuous Spell.
You can only activate 1 "True Calling" per turn.
6674104.name: True Calling

6674104.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Gesellschaft" card.)
If there is a "Gesellschaft" card face-up in your possession: Tribute any number of Level 8 or lower monsters in you control or in your hand; draw cards equal to the number of monster Tributed +1, then if you control a Level 10 or higher "Gesellschaft" monster, draw an additional card. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 10 or higher "Gesellschaft" monster from your hand, then if you have 2 or less cards in your hand, you can add 1 "Gesellschaft" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Σ-Ioxdida" effect per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate an effect of this card, except monsters from the hand and "Gesellschaft" monsters.
6674104.name: Σ-Ioxdida

6674104.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Gesellschaft" card.)
Once per turn, if a "Gesellschaft" monster(s) is Tributed: You can apply 1 of these effects, also if that monster(s) was Tributed by the effect of a Level 10 or higher "Gesellschaft" monster, the ATK of all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls becomes 0 until the end of this turn.
● Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
● 1 face-up monster you control gains 2000 ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn, then if it is a Level 10 or higher monster, gain LP equal to half of its current ATK or DEF (whichever is higher).
You can only activate 1 "Right & Wrong" per turn.

6760980.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except WIND Xyz Monsters. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 WIND Normal Monster from your hand. 6760980.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck, except Xyz Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Final Dream Foresight" per turn.

6760980.effect: All Xyz Monsters you control gain 800 ATK. If you discarded a card other than a "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell to activate this effect, return that Special Summoned monster to the Extra Deck during the End Phase (even if this card leaves the field).

6760980.effect: Target 1 Rank 4 Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Number C" monster that is 1 Rank higher than that monster you control, by using it as the Xyz Material. 5895706.effect: This erudite philosopher has grown tired of the endless pursuit of knowledge. Dark ideas threaten his once incredible moral integrity.

5895706.effect: This sweet innocent girl is unaware of the dark forces spinning an intricate web of deceit around her, preparing to lure her into a life she wants nothing to do with.
5895706.name: Gretchen, Faust's Grace

5895706.effect: Mephisto vowed to make Gretchen almighty. Having been blinded by greed and Dr. Faust's teachings, she vehemently agreed. Thus, she had begun to lose control... Over her actions, her thoughts, her words... all she could understand anymore was "Mephisto".
5895706.name: Mephisto Manifested, Ms. Faust
5895706.pendulum_effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Faust" Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can discard 1 "Faust" Normal Monster; send 1 "Mephisto" Trap from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Mephisto Manifested, Ms. Faust" once per turn, also you cannot Special Summon Effect Monsters the turn you activate either of these effects.

6807125.effect: A failed experiment given life. She lives at the school she was born in and was named by her classmates, both of which on occasion acknowledge her origins.
6807125.name: Ilyza, Hot-Blooded Drakin

6807125.effect: An experiment that went well. Being created in an academy lab has its merits, such as being able to learn about the world she is forbidden from seeing.
6807125.name: Sira, Exploited Drakin

6807125.effect: An experiment that loves experimentation. His passion for research is just as impactful as the drive his co-workers have to create other beings like him.
6807125.name: Vyki, Beloved Drakin

6807125.effect: Add 1 "Drakin" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Drakinkarnation", OR 1 Wyrm monster from your GY to your hand, but if you added an Effect Monster to your hand this way, you cannot Normal Summon monsters, or Special Summon monsters from your hand, with the added monster's name for the rest of this turn.

6807125.effect: If your opponent controls at least 2 monsters, while you control a Wyrm monster: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK (your choice if tied), then, if you control more monsters than your opponent, your opponent can shuffle 1 Effect Monster you control that started the Duel in the Extra Deck into the Deck (if any).

6807125.effect: Normal Monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, during the Main Phase: You can Tribute 1 non-Wyrm monster from your hand or face-up field; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Wyrm Normal Monster from your hand or Deck.

6807125.effect: Tribute 1 Wyrm monster; destroy 1 card on the field. If you Tributed a non-Effect Monster to activate this card, you can destroy up to 2 cards on the field instead.

1 Wyrm monster

6807125.effect:
1 Wyrm monster

6807125.effect:
1 Wyrm monster
Other "Drakin" monsters you control can attack directly, but when they do so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved. Banish this card when it leaves the field.

If you reveal a "Plushmage" monster in your hand by a card effect: You can take 400 damage, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, "Plushmage" monsters you control gain 800 ATK/DEF while this card is face-up on the field. You can only use each effectof "Plushmage Windygal" once per turn.

2+ Level 4 Spellcaster monsters

If this card is in the Monster Zone: You can Tribute 1 other Level 5 or higher monster from your hand or field; apply the appropriate effect based on that Tributed monster's Type.
● Dragon: Banish 1 Ritual Spell from your hand or GY, and if you do, this effect becomes that Spell's effect when that card is activated. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except Dragon and Machine monsters.
● Machine: Add 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand, also, this turn, if this face-up card is used as material for the Fusion Summon of a Dragon or Machine Fusion Monster, you can draw 1 card immediately after that monster is Summoned.
You can only use this effect of "Mechatech Dragon - Magma" once per turn.
7003838.name: Mechatech Dragon - Magma

7003838.effect:
When this card is activated: Declare either Dragon or Machine; Special Summon this card as a Effect Monster (WIND/Level 8/ATK 2200/DEF 1900) with that Type. (This card is also still a Trap). If this card is in the Monster Zone: You can Tribute 1 other Level 5 or higher monster from your hand or field; apply the appropriate effect based on that Tributed monster's Type.
● Dragon: Change 1 face-up monster on the field to face-down Defense Position.
● Machine: Draw 2 cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Mechatech Dragon - Slipstream" once per turn.

7003838.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher Machine monster + 1 Level 5 or higher Dragon monster
Must first be Special Summoned with "Mechatech Overfunded Laboratory". Once per turn, if the ATK/DEF of a face-up monster you control is different from its original ATK/DEF (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on the field; Tribute 1 “Mechatech” monster you control, then negate that target’s effects. Once per turn, if a face-up card(s) on the field is destroyed: You can banish 1 Set card your opponent controls or 1 card in their GY. You can only control 1 "Mechatech Dragon - Blackout". Cannot be used as material for a Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon.
7003838.name: Mechatech Dragon - Blackout

7003838.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher Machine monster + 1 Level 5 or higher Dragon monster
Must first be Special Summoned with "Mechatech Overfunded Research". If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s): You can halve the ATK/DEF of that Summoned monster(s). Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can destroy 1 Set card your opponent controls. If this card is destroyed by your opponent's card effect: You can target 2 Set cards on the field; send them to the GY. You can only control 1 "Mechatech Dragon - Eclipse". Cannot be used as material for a Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon.
7003838.name: Mechatech Dragon - Eclipse

7003838.effect:
1 "Mechatech" Ritual Monster + 1 "Mechatech" Fusion Monster 
(This card is also always treated as a DARK and Dragon monster.)
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can activate 1 “Mechatech Dragon Slayer - Dimensionburst” from your Deck. Each time a card(s) is destroyed or banished, place 1 Overfunded Counter on 1 face-up “Mechatech Dragon Slayer - Dimensionburst” you control for each. This card gains the appropriate effect(s) based on the monsters used as Fusion Material for its Fusion Summon.
● A Machine monster(s): Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster in your hand or field; destroy 1 card on the field.
● A Dragon monster(s): Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is Tributed: You can destroy 1 card on the field.
● A LIGHT monster(s): Once per turn, if a Set card(s) on the field is destroyed: You can banish 1 face-up card on the field.
● A DARK monster(s): Once per turn, if a face-up card(s) on the field is destroyed: You can banish 1 Set card on the field.
7003838.name: Mechatech Dragon Slayer - Dimension Extinction

6837403.effect: She feasted on "The Golden Apples", unbeknownst to her fate forever onward. Her offerings to those beneath her are bountiful, but scarce; there can be only so many who are immortal before some must perish.

●"Malus" card

The first time a "Carcharrack" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect each turn, that monster(s) loses exactly 400 ATK instead. During the End Phase, the ATK of each "Carcharrack" monster you control becomes their original ATK. You can only activate 1 "Submerged City of the Carcharracks" per turn.
3734721.name: Submerged City of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect: At the start of each player's Battle Phase, if you control a "Carcharrack" monster(s): You can make your opponent send monsters they control to the GY until they control the same number of monsters you do. You can target 1 banished "Carcharrack" Spell/Trap; Set it to your field, but shuffle it into the Deck when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Deity of the Carcharracks" once per turn.
3734721.name: Ancient Deity of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect: Add 1 "Carcharrack" or "Rev/Strider" card from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase: You can Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Set other cards by card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use 1 "Shark Ship & Strider Cycler" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
3734721.name: Shark Ship & Strider Cycler

3734721.effect: Send 1 "Carcharrack" monster from your Deck to your GY, or if you control "Kanaloa, the Ultimate Carcharrack", you can send 1 "Carcharrack" card instead. During the End Phase: You can Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Set other cards by card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use 1 effect of "Tragic Defeat of the Carcharracks" per turn, and only once that turn.
3734721.name: Tragic Defeat of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect: If you control a Level 9 or higher "Carcharrack" monster: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it. During the End Phase: You can Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Set other cards by card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use 1 "Savage Attack of the Carcharracks" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
3734721.name: Savage Attack of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect: You can only equip this card to a "Carcharrack" monster. At the start of the Damage Step, if the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster: You can return that opponent's monster to the hand, then destroy this card. During the End Phase: You can Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Set other cards by card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use 1 "Wistful Memory of the Carcharracks" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
3734721.name: Wistful Memory of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect: Target 1 "Carcharrack" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. During the End Phase: You can Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Set other cards by card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use 1 "Undersea Rescue of the Carcharracks" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
3734721.name: Undersea Rescue of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a Level 9 or higher "Carcharrack" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. During the End Phase: You can Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Set other cards by card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only use 1 "Predatory Maw of the Carcharracks" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
3734721.name: Predatory Maw of the Carcharracks

3734721.effect:
Let's go, Carcharracks!
Let's conquer the seas of the world! Using your might and the power of Rev/Strider friendship, we can devour our enemies! Make them pay with their blood!
Yeah!
3734721.name: Kuula, the Carcharrack of the Cross-Currents
3734721.treated_as: Kuula, the Carcharrack of the Cross-Currents

5736933.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Armatos Colosseum" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Gladius" once per turn. "Armatos Legio" Link Monsters that point to this card gain 500 ATK.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Gladius

5736933.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned and is now in a zone that your "Armatos Legio" Link Monster points to: You can target 1 "Judgment Arrows" in your Spell & Trap Zone that Link Monster you control points to; "Armatos Legio" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects this turn, also send the targeted card to the GY, and if you do, destroy all face-up cards your opponent controls, and if you do that, it becomes the End Phase, also skip your next turn. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Magica Alcum" once per Duel.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Magica Alcum

5736933.effect: If an "Armatos Legio" Link Monster points to this card: Your opponent cannot target monsters you control for attacks, except that Link Monster. An "Armatos Legio" Link Monster that points to this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Scutum

5736933.effect: If this face-up card that a Link Monster points to is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Link Summon of an "Armatos Legio" Link Monster: You can pay 1000 LP; shuffle all monsters that were used as material for the Link Summon of that Link Monster from your GY into the Deck, then shuffle cards from your GY into the Deck equal to that Link Monster's Link Rating, then your opponent chooses 1 "Armatos Legio" card from your GY for you to add to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Segmentata" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Segementata

5736933.effect: At the start of the Damage Step, if your "Armatos Legio" Link Monster that points to this card attacks an opponent's monster: Destroy that opponent's monster. All non-Link "Armatos Legio" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle, also any battle damage from a battle involving a non-Link "Armatos Legio" monster you control is halved.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Sica

5736933.effect: You can send 1 "Armatos Legio" monster from your hand to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, decrease this card's original level by 1. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Speculata" once per turn. If your "Armatos Legio" Link Monster that points to this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Speculata

5736933.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Armatos" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Colosseum" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters, except "Armatos Legio" monsters. If you Special Summon an "Armatos Legio" Link Monster: You can send 1 "Armatos Legio" monster from your hand to the GY, then target "Armatos Legio" monsters in your GY, up to that Summoned Link Monster's Link Rating; Special Summon them in Defense Position.
5736933.name: Armatos Colosseum

5736933.effect: Tribute 1 "Armatos Legio" Link Monster; Special Summon 1 Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Link Rating as that Tributed Link Monster, but a different name, and if you do, while it is face-up on the field, you cannot Link Summon Link Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Armatos Fulgur" per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Fulgur

5736933.effect: If you control no monsters in your Extra Monster Zone: Target 1 Link Monster your opponent controls in an Extra Monster Zone; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Armatos Legio" Link Monster from your Extra Deck with the same Link Rating as that banished Link Monster, then Special Summon that banished monster to your opponent's Main Monster Zone. You can only activate 1 "Armatos Judgement Sword" per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Judgement Sword

5736933.effect: When this card is activated: Shuffle 1 "Armatos" Spell/Trap from your GY into your Deck, then add 1 "Armatos Legio" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, if both players control exactly 1 monster and an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can negate that attack. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 "Armatos Legio" monster you control; draw 1 card. You can only control 1 "Armatos Lex".
5736933.name: Armatos Lex

5736933.effect: Tribute 1 "Armatos Legio" Link Monster, then target 1 "Armatos Legio" Link Monster in your GY with an equal or lower Link Rating than that Tributed Link Monster, except that Tributed Link Monster; Special Summon it. You can only activate 1 "Armatos Replacement" per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Replacement

5736933.effect: All monsters in this card's column and its adjacent columns are treated as being linked. If an "Armatos Legio" Link Monster in the same column as this card and its adjacent columns battles, its ATK becomes double its current ATK during damage calculation only. When this card is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Destroy all monsters you control. You can discard your entire hand (min. 3) to negate this effect. You can only this effect of "Judgement Arrows" once per turn.
5736933.name: Judgement Arrows

5736933.effect: Monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by card effects, also neither player can banish cards on the field. If this face-up card is destroyed by a card effect: Destroy all monsters you control. When this card is destroyed: Both players draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Gloria" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Gloria

5736933.effect:
2 "Armatos Legio" monsters
Once per turn, if your "Armatos Legio" monster is targeted for an attack: You can negate that attack. You can Tribute this card, then target 2 "Armatos Legio" monsters in your GY; add them to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Centurion" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Centurion

5736933.effect:
1 Level 4 or lower "Armatos Legio" monster
After this card is Link Summoned, the first time it would be destroyed by a card effect this turn, it is not destroyed. If another "Armatos Legio" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Decurion" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Decurion

5736933.effect:
2+ "Armatos Legio" monsters
(Quick Effect): You can target 2 "Armatos Legio" monsters (1 you control and 1 in your GY); negate the effects of the first target and if you do, Special Summon that second target from your GY. If an "Armatos Legio" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field while this monster is on the field: You can activate this effect; this turn, this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can only use each effect of "Armatos Legio Legatus Legionis" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Legatus Legionis

5736933.effect:
3+ "Armatos Legio" monsters
You can target cards on the field and/or GY, up to the number of monsters linked to this card; return them to the hand. When your opponent activates a Link Monster's effect while this card is linked (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Armatos Legio Magnus Dux" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Magnus Dux

5736933.effect:
2 "Armatos Legio" monsters, including a Link Monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can banish cards from the top of your Deck equal to the number of monsters you control, and if you do, during your next Standby Phase, add those banished cards to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Armatos Legio" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Armatos Legio Pilus Prior" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Pilus Prior

5736933.effect:
2+ "Armatos Legio" Link Monsters
While this card is in the Extra Monster Zone, its ATK becomes double its original ATK. If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Judgement Arrows" from your Deck or GY to your hand, then place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, but banish it when it leaves the field. Once per turn, while this card is in a Spell & Trap Zone: You can return 1 Link Monster from your GY to the Extra Deck; all monsters you control gain 500 ATK, also any battle damage your opponent takes is halved.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Plumbum Trident

5736933.effect:
3 "Armatos Legio" monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 Link Monster this card points to; negate the effects of face-up cards on the field up to that target's Link Rating until the end of this turn. This card cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Armatos Legio" monster; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then, if you Tributed a Link Monster to activate this effect, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Armatos Legio Tribunus Militum" once per turn.
5736933.name: Armatos Legio Tribunus Militum

7548170.effect:
You can reveal this card in your hand; your opponent can reveal 1 Link Monster from their Extra Deck to banish this card, otherwise Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of “Psycircuit Electrician” once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following “Psycircuit Electrician” effects per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate an effect of this card, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters.
● If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; draw 1 card, and if it was a “Psycircuit” card, you can reveal it, and if you do that, destroy the target.
● If this card is banished: You can place 1 “Psycircuit” Continuous Trap from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Electrician

7548170.effect:
You can reveal this card in your hand; your opponent can reveal 1 Xyz Monster from their Extra Deck to banish this card, otherwise Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of “Psycircuit Malware” once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following “Psycircuit Malware” effects per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate an effect of this card, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters.
● If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished “Psycircuit” monsters.
● If this card is banished: You can Special Summon 1 “Psycircuit” monster from your hand.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Malware

7548170.effect:
You can reveal this card in your hand; your opponent can reveal 1 Pendulum Monster from their Extra Deck to banish this card, otherwise Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of “Psycircuit Mechanic” once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following “Psycircuit Mechanic” effects per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate an effect of this card, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters.
● If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 “Psycircuit” card from your Deck to your hand, except “Psycircuit Mechanic”.
● If this card is banished: You can add 1 “Psycircuit” monster from your Deck to your hand, except “Psycircuit Mechanic”.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Mechanic

7548170.effect:
You can reveal this card in your hand; your opponent can reveal 1 Fusion Monster from their Extra Deck to banish this card, otherwise Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of “Psycircuit Machination” once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following “Psycircuit Mechination” effects per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate an effect of this card, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters.
● If this card is Special Summoned: You can place 1 of your “Psycircuit” Continuous Traps that is banished or in your hand face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.
● If this card is banished: You can add 1 “Psycircuit” card from your Deck to your hand, except “Psycircuit Mechination”.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Mechination

7548170.effect:
You can reveal this card in your hand; your opponent can reveal 1 Synchro Monster from their Extra Deck to banish this card, otherwise Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of “Psycircuit Technician” once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following “Psycircuit Technician” effects per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate an effect of this card, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters.
● If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 “Psycircuit” card from your Deck, except “Psycircuit Technician”.
● If this card is banished: You can take 1 of your banished “Psycircuit” cards, except “Psycircuit Technician”, and either add it to your hand, of if that card was a monster, you can Special Summon it instead.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Technician

7548170.effect: Add 1 “Psycircuit” monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 “Psycircuit Data Miner” per turn, also you cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate this card, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Data Miner

7548170.effect:
“Psycircuit“ monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF for each card revealed from the hand, Main Deck, and Extra Deck, this turn while this card was face-up. While you control another “Psycircuit” card, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects. While there is a “Psycircuit” monster on the field, this card gains these effects.
● During the Main Phase: The turn player can reveal 1 monster from their Extra Deck.
● The turn player cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except monsters with the same original name as a monster(s) revealed from their Extra Deck by the effect of a “Psycircuit“ card this turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Interference

7548170.effect: When your opponent Synchro Summons a Synchro Monster(s): You can target any number of monster in your opponent’s GY that were used as Synchro Material for this Summon; shuffle that many of your banished "Psycircuit" cards into the Deck, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, neither player can Summon cards with the same Level/Rank as the target(s)’ Level. If a non-Synchro Monster is revealed from your opponent’s Extra Deck: You can banish this card, and if you do, Set directly from your Deck, 1 “Psycircuit” Continuous Trap that has an effect when a monster with the same card Type (Fusion/Xyz/Pendulum/Link) as that revealed monster is Summoned. You can only use each effect of “Psycircuit Cacophony” once per turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Cacophony

7548170.effect:
“Psycircuit“ monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF for each card revealed from the hand, Main Deck, and Extra Deck, this turn while this card was face-up. You cannot Summon or Set monsters, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters. You can only use each of the following “Psycircuit Construction” effects once per turn.
● If you control another “Psycircuit” card(s): You can banish 1 monster from your Extra Deck face-down, and if you do, draw 1 card.
● If a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum, or Link monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can banish up to 3 cards from either GY, then, if you banished 3 of your cards by this effect, destroy 1 card on the field.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Construction

7548170.effect:
When your opponent Link Summons a Link Monster(s): You can choose Main Monster and/or Spell & Trap Zones on the field that a Link Monster points to, up to the number of monsters used as Link Material for that Link Summon; shuffle your banished "Psycircuit" cards into the Deck equal to the number of chosen Zones, then apply this effect for the rest of the turn. 
● If a card(s) is face-up in that zone(s), its effects are negated. If there is a Set card(s), it cannot be flipped face-up. If no card is in that zone(s), it cannot be used.
If a non-Link Monster is revealed from your opponent’s Extra Deck: You can banish this card, and if you do, Set directly from your Deck, 1 “Psycircuit” Continuous Trap that has an effect when a monster with the same card Type (Fusion/Synchro/Xyz/Pendulum) as that revealed monster is Summoned. You can only use each effect of “Psycircuit Encryption” once per turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Encryption

7548170.effect: When your opponent Fusion Summons a Fusion Monster(s): You can target 1 monster on the field or in the GY, with the same Type as a monster used as Fusion Material for that Summon; shuffle 1 of your banished "Psycircuit" cards into the Deck, then banish it. If a non-Fusion Monster is revealed from your opponent’s Extra Deck: You can banish this card, and if you do, Set directly from your Deck, 1 “Psycircuit” Continuous Trap that has an effect when a monster with the same card Type (Synchro/Xyz/Pendulum/Link) as that revealed monster is Summoned. You can only use each effect of “Psycircuit Extraction” once per turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Extraction

7548170.effect:
While your opponent has no cards in their Extra Deck, halve the ATK/DEF of all face-up monsters they control. While you control a “Psycircuit” monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, your opponent cannot activate the effects of monsters they control that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set, except a monster with the same card Type (Fusion/Xyz/Synchro/Pendulum/Link) as a monster revealed from the Extra Deck this turn. You cannot Summon or Set monsters, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters. You can only use each of the following “Psycircuit Failsafe Storm” effects once per turn.
● If your opponent has no cards in their Extra Deck, OR they Special Summon a monster(s) that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set, except a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum, or Link Monster(s): You can add 1 “Cynet Stormbringer” from your Deck to your hand, also you can shuffle 1 of your “Cynet Storm” that is banished or in your GY into the Deck.
● If a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum, or Link monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can shuffle this card into the Deck, also after, activate 1 “Psycicuit” Continuous Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY, except “Psycircuit Failsafe”.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Failsafe Storm

7548170.effect: When your opponent Xyz Summons a Xyz Monster(s): You can shuffle up to 3 (min. 1) of your banished "Psycircuit" cards into the Deck, then detach all materials from Xyz Monsters on the field up to the number of cards you shuffled, then if you shuffled 3 cards into your Deck, negate the effects of all Xyz Monsters on the field that have no materials. If an non-Xyz Monster is revealed from your opponent’s Extra Deck: You can banish this card, and if you do, Set directly from your Deck, 1 “Psycircuit” Continuous Trap that has an effect when a monster with the same card Type (Fusion/Synchro/Pendulum/Link) as that revealed monster is Summoned. You can only use each effect of “Psycircuit Network Outage” once per turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Network Outage

7548170.effect: When your opponent Special Summons a Pendulum Monster(s) from their Extra Deck: You can shuffle a number of your banished "Psycircuit" cards into the Deck equal to the number of Pendulum Monsters Special Summoned, and if you do, negate that Summon, and if you do that, banish them. If a non-Pendulum Monster is revealed from your opponent’s Extra Deck: You can banish this card, and if you do, Set directly from your Deck, 1 “Psycircuit” Continuous Trap that has an effect when a monster with the same card Type (Fusion/Synchro/Xyz/Link) as that revealed monster is Summoned. You can only use each effect of “Psycircuit Stabilization” once per turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Stabilization

7548170.effect:
If your opponent has Special Summoned a monster from their Extra Deck this turn, you can activate this card from your hand by banishing 1 “Psycircuit” card from your hand or field. Once per turn: You can gain 1000 LP, then take 2000 damage. You cannot Summon or Set monsters, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters. You can only use 1 of the following “Psycircuit Systems Hack” effects per turn, and only once that turn.
● If you have a “Psycircuit” card in your GY: You can reveal 1 card from your Extra Deck; banish it face-down, then look at your opponent’s Extra Deck, and reveal 1 card from it, if it is the same card type (Fusion/Xyz/Synchro/Pendulum/Link) as the banished monster, banish it face-down, otherwise banish 1 card from your GY.
● If your opponent Special Summons a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum, or Link Monster(s): You can activate 1 “Psycircuit interference” from your Deck, GY, or that is banished, or if you control “Psyciruit Interference”, you can Special Summon 1 Cyberse monster from your hand, GY, or that is banished instead.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Systems Hack

7548170.effect:
2+ Level 5 Cyberse monsters
Once per turn, you can activate 1 “Psycircuit” Trap the turn it is Set by banishing 1 other ”Psycircuit” card from your hand or field. You can only use each of the following effects of “Psycircuit Gateway Admin N” once per turn, also, you cannot Summon or Set monsters the turn you activate either effect, except Level/Rank/Link-5 monsters. 
● When a monster(s) is revealed from your opponent’s hand, Main Deck, or Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; banish the revealed monster, and if you do, banish all monsters from their Extra Deck with the same original name as that revealed monster(s).
● If a card(s) is banished, except by “Psycircuit Gateway Admin N”: You can target 1 monster on the field, or if you have 3 or more banished “Psycircuit” cards with different names, you can target 1 Spell/Trap instead; destroy it.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Gateway Admin N

7548170.effect:
2+ Level 5 Cyberse monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card; until the end of the next turn, if you activate the effect of a “Psycircuit” monster in your hand that gives your opponent the choice to reveal a monster from their Extra Deck to banish that “Psycircuit” monster, you can look at their Extra Deck, and if they have a monster in their Extra Deck with the same card Type (Fusion/Synchro/Xyz/Pendulum/Link) that is listed on this effect of that “Psycircuit” monster, reveal it from their Extra Deck instead, and if you do, banish that “Psycircuit” monster, otherwise Special Summon that monster in Defense Position. During your opponent’s turn, this card gains these effects.
● During the Main Phase: The turn player can reveal 1 monster from their Extra Deck.
● The turn player cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except monsters with the same original name as a monster(s) revealed from their Extra Deck this turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Server Admin P

7548170.effect:
5 Level/Rank/Link-5 Cyberse monsters
(Quick Effect): You can take 2000 damage, then, look at your opponent’s Extra Deck, and reveal 1 card from it, and if you do, banish it face-down. You can only use this effect of “Psycircuit Storm Admin V” once per turn. If an opponent’s card(s) is revealed in the hand, Main Deck, and/or Extra Deck: You can gain 500 LP for each revealed card. If you control a face-up Field Spell, it is treated as a “Psycircuit” card and it gains these effects.
● During the Main Phase: The turn player can reveal 1 monster from their Extra Deck.
● The turn player cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except monsters with the same original name as a monster(s) revealed from their Extra Deck by the effect of a “Psycircuit” card this turn.
7548170.name: Psycircuit Storm Admin V

6848354.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Banish 1 "9s" monster from your GY. If this card is banished by an activated card effect: You can banish 1 "9s" monster from your face-up Extra Deck. You can only use 1 monster effect of "Arbitrator of the 9s" per turn, and only once that turn.
6848354.name: Arbitrator of the 9s
6848354.pendulum_effect: If you do not have a Pendulum Monster in your other Pendulum Zone: You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you banished at least 1 "9s" card this way, you can add 1 banished "9s" card to your hand, but the effects of cards banished by this effect cannot be activated. You can only use this effect of "Arbitrator of the 9s" once per turn.

6848354.effect: If you control a "9s" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you control no other "9s" monsters: You can Special Summon any number of "9s" monsters from your face-up Extra Deck or hand, whose combined Levels exactly equal this card's Level. 7997640.effect: The experiment had worked. The once normal boy, now with Unbeing DNA implanted inside of him. To do this to him would be pure evil... but anything for the greater good, right? Now, to send him off, to gain information on these beings known as, well, Unbeings...

7997640.effect: The second experiment, once a normal girl, asked, "Why are the Unbeings classified as Dinosaurs, father?". The only answer she got was, "Well, Dinosaurs are real old, ey? And so are these things! So they must be Dinosaurs!". This seemed to satisfy her, for a while, at least... until she asked, "Why must we destroy them?". She didn't ever get an answer to that question, though...

8352501.effect:

You can only use each effect of "Scrylak Ambush" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Ambush

7074117.effect:
If you have excavated a "Scrylak" Spell by your card effect this turn (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Place 1 "Scrylak" card from your Deck on the top of your Deck.
● Special Summon up to 2 "Scrylak" monsters from your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card.
You can only use this effect of "Scrylak Author" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Author

7074117.effect: If this card is face-up in your possession, and you have Summoned a "Scrylak Enforcer(s)" this turn: You can place up to 3 face-up "Scrylak" Spells in your possession on the top or bottom of your Deck in any order. When a monster declares an attack, while this card is in your GY and you have excavated a "Scrylak" Spell by your card effect this turn: You can negate that attack, and if you do, any monsters in the columns adjacent to that opponent's monster cannot attack for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Scrylak Enforcer" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Enforcer

7074117.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, send 1 excavated card to the GY, also place the rest on the top or bottom of your Deck in any order. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" monsters in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use each effect of "Scrylak Recruiter" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Recruiter

7074117.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 2 cards of your Deck, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, add 1 excavated card to your hand, also place the rest on the top or bottom of your Deck any order. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" monsters in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use each effect of "Scrylak Relaxer" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Relaxer

7074117.effect: Pay LP in multiples of 300 (max. 1500); excavate 1 card from the top of your Deck for every 300 LP paid, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, you can gain 400 LP for each excavated "Scrylak" card, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated non-Spell "Scrylak" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" Spells in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use 1 "Scrylak Altar" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Altar

7074117.effect: When an attack is declared: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, banish 1 monster on the field, also shuffle those excavated cards into the Deck. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" Spells in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use 1 "Scrylak Force" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Force

7074117.effect: Your opponent can shuffle any number of cards from their hand into their Deck, also, after that, excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand x 2 + 1, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, banish as many cards from the top of your opponent's Deck as possible, face-down, up to the number of excavated "Scrylak" cards, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" Spells in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use 1 "Scrylak Insight" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Insight

7074117.effect: Excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, you can send up to 2 excavated non-Spell "Scrylak" cards to the GY, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" Spells in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use 1 "Scrylak Preparation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Preparation

7074117.effect: Excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, you can add 1 excavated Spell to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. If you added a non-"Scrylak" Spell to your hand by this effect, you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with the same name as that Spell until the end of the next turn. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" Spells in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. You can only use 1 "Scrylak Research" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Research

7074117.effect: If you have excavated a "Scrylak" Spell by your card effect this turn, or if you control a "Scrylak" card: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If a "Scrylak" Spell is excavated by your card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate the effects of other "Scrylak" Traps in your GY during the Chain this effect is activated. If you control a "Scrylak" monster, or if only your opponent controls a monster, you can activate this card from your hand.

7074117.effect:
1 "Scrylak" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
While this card's current ATK is greater than its original ATK, you never take damage if that damage is less than the difference. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a Spell, then, if that card is a "Scrylak" Spell, you can make this card gain 200 ATK for each excavated card and all monsters your opponent controls lose the same amount of ATK, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Scrylak Botta" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Botta

7074117.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can excavate the top 6 cards of your Deck, then, if you excavated a "Scrylak" Spell, you can Special Summon 1 "Scrylak" monster from your GY in Defense Position, also place the rest on the top of your Deck in any order. You can only use this effect of "Scrylak Folora" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Folora

7074117.effect:
3 Level 3 monsters
If you have excavated a "Scrylak" Spell by your card effect this turn, you can also Xyz Summon this card by using 2 Level 2 and/or 3 monsters you control as material, including a "Scrylak" monster. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; excavate the top card of your Deck and add it to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a "Scrylak" Spell, and if you do, gain 200 LP for each excavated card, also shuffle the excavated cards into the Deck.
7074117.name: Scrylak Lancer

7074117.effect:
1 Level 4 or lower "Scrylak" monster
Cannot attack. Neither player takes damage from battles involving this card. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Scrylak" monster; Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Scrylak Bodyblock" once per turn. You can only Link Summon "Scrylak Bodyblock(s)" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Bodyblock

7074117.effect:
2 "Scrylak" monsters with different names
If you have excavated a "Scrylak" Spell by your card effect this turn, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Scrylak" monster from your hand. If this card on the field is Tributed: You can target 1 card on each field; destroy them, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Scrylak Dynabow" once per turn.
7074117.name: Scrylak Dynabow

9109731.effect: If you control a FIRE monster, except "Bandit of the Endless Sands", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Bandit of the Endless Sands" once per turn this way. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: Draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Bandit of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Bandit of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 Level 2 FIRE monster from your GY to your hand. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Beetle of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Beetle of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Level 2 Insect monster from your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can send 1 FIRE Insect monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Insectoid of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Insectoid of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: When this card is Summoned: You can reveal 1 "Endless Sands" monster in your hand; add 1 "Endless Sands" card from your Deck to your hand, then place the revealed card on the top of the Deck. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can target 1 other non-Xyz "Endless Sands" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Merchant of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Merchant of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Rider of the Endless Sands" from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Rider of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Rider of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: If you have 2 or more "Endless Sands" monsters in your GY with different names, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Scorpion of the Endless Sands" once per turn this way. Destroy any monster that battles this card after damage calculation. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Scorpion of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Scorpion of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: If you control an "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Spearman of the Endless Sands" once per turn this way. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: Add it to your hand. You must control a face-up "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card to activate and resolve this effect. You can only use this effect of "Spearman of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Spearman of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; send 1 "Endless Sands" monster from your Deck to your GY. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: Target 1 monster on the field; change its battle position. You can only use each effect of "Stalker of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Stalker of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: The Sands of Time are in a constant cycle, and we are all caught up in its flow. How thick is the glass that cages us - that imprisons us in the mistakes of our past?
9109731.name: Wanderer of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: Activate 1 "Hourglass" Continuous Trap from your Deck, also you cannot activate "Rank-Up-Magic" cards for the rest of this turn. If an "Hourglass" Continuous Trap(s) you control would be destroyed by an opponent's card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Confinement of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Confinement of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: Target 1 face-up "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 2 "Endless Sands" monsters from your GY with different names, but their effects are negated. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card; add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Release of the Endless Sands" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except FIRE monsters.
9109731.name: Release of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect: Draw 2 cards, then reveal 1 "Endless Sands" monster in your hand and place it on the top of the Deck, or, if you cannot, shuffle your entire hand into the Deck.

9109731.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. All "Endless Sands" monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can reveal 1 "Endless Sands" monster in your Deck and place it on the top of the Deck. You can only activate 1 "The Endless Sands of Time" per turn.
9109731.name: The Endless Sands of Time

9109731.effect: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is an "Endless Sands" monster, send it to the GY, otherwise shuffle it into the Deck. Once per turn: You can target 4 "Endless Sands" monsters in either GY and 1 card on the field; shuffle those first 4 targets into the Deck, then return the 5th target to the hand, and if you do, Set this card. You can activate this card from your hand during your Main Phase.
9109731.name: Hourglass of Distortion

9109731.effect: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is an "Endless Sands" monster, send it to the GY, otherwise shuffle it into the Deck. Once per turn: You can target 3 "Endless Sands" monsters in either GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card, then Set this card. You can activate this card from your hand during your Main Phase.
9109731.name: Hourglass of Dreams

9109731.effect: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is an "Endless Sands" monster, send it to the GY, otherwise shuffle it into the Deck. Once per turn: You can target 2 "Endless Sands" monsters in either GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, gain 1000 LP, then Set this card. You can activate this card from your hand during your Main Phase.
9109731.name: Hourglass of Idealism

9109731.effect: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is an "Endless Sands" monster, send it to the GY, otherwise shuffle it into the Deck. Once per turn: You can target 3 "Endless Sands" monsters in either GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, all face-up FIRE monsters you control gain 1000 ATK, also if a face-up FIRE monster you control attacks an opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. You can activate this card from your hand during your Main Phase.
9109731.name: Hourglass of Might

9109731.effect: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is an "Endless Sands" monster, send it to the GY, otherwise shuffle it into the Deck. Once per turn: You can target 3 "Endless Sands" monsters in either GY, and 1 other FIRE monster in your GY; shuffle the first 3 targets into the Deck, then Special Summon the 4th target, and if you do, Set this card, also if that Summoned monster is an Xyz Monster, you can also attach 1 card from your GY to it as material. You can activate this card from your hand during your Main Phase.
9109731.name: Hourglass of Rebirth

9109731.effect: Must first be Special Summoned with "Rank-Down-Magic Accursed Force". Gains 1000 ATK for each material attached to it. If a FIRE monster(s) in your GY is shuffled into your Deck: You can target 1 other face-up card on the field; attach it to this card as material. You can only use this effect of "AXyz Vipera, Unleashed Tyrant" once per turn. If this card you control would be destroyed, you can detach 1 material from this card instead.
9109731.name: AXyz Vipera, Unleashed Tyrant

9109731.effect:
3 Level 3 FIRE monsters
While you control an "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card, this card gains 500 ATK/DEF. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card in your GY; place it on on the top of the Deck. While this card has a Reptile Xyz Monster attached to it as material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card you control; destroy it, and if you do, negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls until the End Phase.

9109731.effect:
4 Level 4 FIRE monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Gains 300 ATK for each "Endless Sands" monster in your GY with different names. While this card has a Psychic Xyz Monster attached to it as material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target an equal number of "Hourglass" Continuous Traps you control; return them to the hand, and if you do, return an equal number of cards your opponent controls to the hand.
9109731.name: Quan, Unleashed Hope

9109731.effect:
2 Level 2 FIRE monsters
If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 "Endless Sands" monster in your GY; put it on the top of the Deck. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card and Set 1 face-up "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card you control, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
9109731.name: Amphisbanea, Nightmare of the Endless Sands
9109731.treated_as: Amphisbanea, Nightmare of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect:
3 Level 2 FIRE monsters
When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card in your GY; add it to your hand, but you cannot activate cards or the effects of cards with the same name as that added card this turn. All monsters in your opponent's GY are also treated as "Endless Sands" monsters. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is shuffled from the GY(s) into the Deck(s) by a card effect: You can detach 1 material from this card; inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster shuffled. You can only control 1 "Embodiment of the Endless Sands".

9109731.effect:
2 Level 2 FIRE monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Gains 300 ATK for each "Endless Sands" monster in your GY with a different name. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle while all monsters you control are FIRE monsters: You can detach 1 material from this card, then reveal 1 Set "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card you control; force its activation, and if you do, destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

9109731.treated_as: Quan, Hope of the Endless Sands

9109731.effect:
2+ Level 2 monsters
Loses 1000 ATK for each material attached to it. If you would target an "Endless Sands" monster(s) in either GY to activate the effect of an "Hourglass" Continuous Trap, you can choose the same number of appropriate materials attached to this card instead. When you activate an effect of an "Hourglass" Continuous Trap Card (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on the field; its effects are negated (even if this card leaves the field). You can only use this effect of "Vipera, Tyrant of the Endless Sands" once per turn.
9109731.name: Vipera, Tyrant of the Endless Sands
9109731.treated_as: Vipera, Tyrant of the Endless Sands

9022784.effect:
You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Gala-XY Captain" per turn, and only once that turn.
● You can Tribute 1 non-Insect "Gala-XY" monster from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand.
● If this card is sent to the GY or banished to activate a "Gala-XY" card or effect: You can draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.

You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Gala-XY Researcher" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Summoned: You can send 1 "Gala-XY" card from your Deck to the GY, except a Fish monster.
● If this card is sent to the GY or banished to activate a "Gala-XY" card or effect: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it.

You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Gala-XY Rider" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 non-Dinosaur "Gala-XY" monster from your hand.
● If this card is sent to the GY or banished to activate a "Gala-XY" card or effect: You can add 1 non-Dinosaur "Gala-XY" monster from your GY to your hand.

9022784.effect:
You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Gala-XY Soldier" per turn, and only once that turn.

● If this card is sent to the GY or banished to activate a "Gala-XY" card or effect: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

9022784.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Tribute 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your hand or field; Special Summon 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your Deck.
● Banish 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your GY; this turn, "Gala-XY" monsters you currently control cannot be destroyed by card effects.
You can only activate 1 "Gala-XY Driver" per turn.
9022784.name: Gala-XY Driver

9022784.effect:
All "Gala-XY" monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. You can only use each of the following effects of "Gala-XY Outpost" once per turn.
● When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● When an opponent's monster declares an attack on a "Gala-XY" monster you control: You can banish 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your GY; negate that attack.

If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 of your banished "Gala-XY" cards, except "Gala-XY Crash"; return it to the GY, then Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Gala-XY Crash" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
9022784.name: Gala-XY Crash

9022784.effect: Tribute 1 "Gala-XY" monster, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. If this card is in your GY: You can banish this card and 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your GY, then target 1 "Gala-XY" monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. You can only use 1 "Gala-XY Fleet" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
9022784.name: Gala-XY Fleet

9022784.effect: Banish 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Gala-XY" monsters from your GY, but negate its effects. You can banish this card from your GY; shuffle 5 of your "Gala-XY" cards, that are banished and/or in your GY into your Deck, except "Gala-XY Raid", then draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Gala-XY Raid" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
9022784.name: Gala-XY Raid

9022784.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Gala-XY" card.)
As the daughter of the lead researcher of the planetary exploration unit of the Gala science and research society, Etta was destined for greatness — but that all changed when a group of savage pirates attacked, causing their spaceship to crash into an unknown planet. Etta, being the only survivor, does anything she can to keep going, and maybe, just maybe, she might just find a way back home one day.
9022784.name: Etta, the Bird of Prey
9022784.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if your "Gala-XY" card would Tribute a monster(s) to activate its effect, you can banish 1 "Gala-XY" monster from your GY instead.

● If this card destroys a monster by battle: Inflict 2000 damage to your opponent.
8145980.name: DMG Round : HESH

8145980.effect: Target 1 "DMG" monster you control that has not declared an attack this turn; that target cannot attack this turn, also Special Summon 1 "DMG" monster from your Deck with a different name among monsters you control. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "DMG" monsters. You can only activate 1 "DMG Round : Flare" per turn.
8145980.name: DMG Round : Flare

8145980.effect: You can reveal 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell in your hand; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 "DMG Round" card with a different name from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "DMG Round Storage" once per turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can add 1 "DMG Round" card from your Deck to your hand, except "DMG Round Storage".
8145980.name: DMG Round Storage

8145980.effect: "DMG" monsters on the field gain 1 additional attack on monsters during each Battle Phase. "DMG" monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects during the Main Phase. Once per turn, if a "DMG" monster(s) you control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "DMG" monster with a different name from your hand.
8145980.name: DMG-WZ : FRONT

8145980.effect: Target up to 5 "DMG" cards that are banished or in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card for every 2 "DMG Round" Normal Spells with different names shuffled. You can only activate 1 "DMG Round Resupply" per turn.
8145980.name: DMG Round Resupply

8145980.effect: Once per turn: You can discard 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it, then, if you discarded "DMG Round : HE", destroy all Spell/Traps in Spell & Trap Zones adjacent to that destroyed card’s zone. Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can add 1 "DMG Round" Spell from your Deck to your hand, then return this card to the hand.
8145980.name: DMG-SPG : ARROW

8145980.effect:
1 non-Link "DMG" monster with 2000 or more ATK
Once per turn: You can discard 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. The following effects of "DMG-HZ : HAMMER" cannot be negated. This card cannot declare an attack unless you discard 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell. If this card is targeted for an attack: Discard 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell or this card's original ATK becomes 0 during the Damage Step only.
8145980.name: DMG-HZ : HAMMER

8145980.effect:
2 non-Link "DMG" monsters with different names
Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can add 1 "DMG Round" card from your Deck to your hand. The following effects of "DMG-SH: RAMPART" cannot be negated. This card cannot declare an attack unless you discard 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell, and if you do, this card's original ATK becomes 3000 during the Damage Step only. If this card is targeted for an attack: Discard 1 "DMG Round" Normal Spell or this card's original ATK becomes 2000 during the Damage Step only.
8145980.name: DMG-SH : RAMPART

8145980.effect:
3+ "DMG" monsters
This card's effects cannot be negated. At the start of the Battle Phase: You can discard as many "DMG Round" Normal Spells from your hand as possible, and if you do, this card can attack that many times during this Battle Phase only. If you do not, this card cannot attack this turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can add "DMG Round" cards from your Deck to your hand, up to the number of "DMG Round" Normal Spells discarded by the effect of a "DMG" monster this turn.
8145980.name: DMG-LS : FORTRESS

9771722.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Iffrean" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Iffrean Initiator". You can banish this card and 1 other FIRE Dragon monster from your GY, except "Iffrean Initiator"; Special Summon 1 "Iffrean" monster from your hand, except "Iffrean Initiator". You can only use each effect of "Iffrean Initiator" once per turn.

You can only use each effect of "Iffrean Nexus" once per turn.

You can only use each effect of "Iffrean Flare" once per turn.

9771722.effect: You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 "Iffrean" monster in your GY, except "Ardenti Incursio, Iffrean Devastator"; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Ardenti Incursio, Iffrean Devastator" once per turn.

9771722.effect: You can discard 1 other FIRE Dragon monster to the GY, except "Ignea Salus, Iffrean Emancipator"; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is banished: You can add 1 "Iffrean" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Ignea Salus, Iffrean Emancipator". 9771722.name: Ignea Salus, Iffrean Emancipator

9771722.effect: You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 of your banished "Iffrean" monsters, except "Ignis Magnus, Iffrean Conqueror"; Special Summon it in Defense Position. If this card is banished: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ignis Magnus, Iffrean Conqueror" once per turn.

9771722.effect: You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 of your banished "Iffrean" monsters, except "Lex Incendio, Iffrean Adjudicator"; add it to your hand. If this card is banished: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Lex Incendio, Iffrean Adjudicator" once per turn.

9771722.effect:
2 FIRE monsters including an "Iffrean" monster.
Must be Link Summoned. FIRE Dragon monsters this card points to that have a Level can be treated as Level 7 for the Xyz Summon of an Xyz Monster. If this card is Link Summoned: You can banish 1 "Iffrean" monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Iffrean Connector" once per turn.
9771722.name: Iffrean Connector

9771722.effect:
2+ Level 7 monsters
Must be Xyz Summoned. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can destroy it. You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target up to that many cards your opponent controls -1; destroy them, also, this card gains ATK equal to half the combined original ATK of all "Iffrean" monsters with different names detached to activate this effect until the end of this turn. If this card on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon up to 4 Level 7 "Iffrean" monsters with different names (1 each that is banished, in your hand, Deck, and GY) in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn except Xyz Monsters. You can only use each effect of "Iffrean Ravager" once per turn.
9771722.name: Iffrean Ravager

You can reveal 1 Set "Submerzan" monster you control; rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters in your Main Monster Zones, then change them to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Submerzan Sub-World" once per turn.

During the End Phase, change as many face-up monsters you control to face-down Defense Position as possible, and if you do, you can draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Submission" per turn.

6395566.effect: Change 1 face-down Defense Position "Submerzan" monster you control to face-up Attack Position, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Subservience" per turn.

6395566.effect: When your opponent activates a card or effect: Change 1 face-up "Submerzan" monster you control to face-down Defense Position; negate the activation. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Subterfuge" per turn.

6395566.effect: In an undersea world, there exist multiple tribes of fish-people, constantly at war with each other. One day, an incredible power froze the world above and attempted to seize their world. They had to band together under a peace treaty to keep their own domain safe. Together, the Submerzans hide beneath the surface to attack unsuspecting surface dwellers.
6395566.name: Rybish, Submerzan Servant

6395566.effect:
2 Sea Serpent monsters, including 1 "Submerzan" monster
This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Set of a monster. When this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Submerzan" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except in face-down Defense Position. During your Main Phase: You can change 1 face-down Defense Position "Submerzan" monster you control to face-up Attack Position; this turn, you can Normal Set 1 monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) You can only use each effect of "Meduzelly, Princess of the Submerzans" once per turn.
6395566.name: Meduzelly, Submerzan Princess

6395566.effect:
2+ Sea Serpent monsters
You can also use face-down Defense Position monsters you control as material to Link Summon this card. While you control a face-down Defense Position monster, if your opponent can Summon monsters in their Main Monster Zones in the same column(s) as a face-down Defense Position monster you control, they must Summon monsters to those zones. While this card points to a face-down Defense Position monster, it cannot be destroyed by card effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can change 1 face-down Defense Position non-WATER "Submerzan" monster you control to face-up Attack Position; apply that monster's Flip effect.
6395566.name: Zhakhorror, Eldritch Beast of the Submerzans
